servinfo.title: Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Tension Inspection and Adjustment (For M16 Engine)

item.ptxt: Disconnect negative cable at battery before checking and adjusting belt tension.
To help avoid danger of being burned, do not remove radiator cap while engine and radiator are still hot. Scalding fluid and steam can be blown out under pressure if cap is taken off too soon.

s1.ptxt: Inspect belt for cracks, cuts, deformation, wear and cleanliness. If it is necessary to replace belt, refer to Water Pump and Generator Drive Belt Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model .
Check belt for tension. Belt is in proper tension when it deflects the following specification under thumb pressure (about 10 kg or 22 lb.).

spec-sdm.sdm-title: Water pump / generator drive belt tension

sdm1.sdm-value: 7.0 – 8.5 mm (0.28 – 0.33 in.) as deflection / 10 kg (22 lbs)
5.5 – 6.5 mm (0.22 – 0.26 in.) as deflection / 10 kg (22 lbs)

s1.ptxt: If belt is too tight or too loose, adjust it to proper tension by displacing generator position.
To adjust belt tension, loosen generator adjusting bolt (3) and displace generator position by loosening on tightening adjuster bolt.
Tighten generator adjusting bolt (1) and pivot bolts (2) as specified torque.
Check belt for tension after turn crankshaft two rotations clockwise.
Tightening generator adjuster bolt (3) as specified torque.
